name: Headscale
description: headscale aims to implement a self-hosted, open source alternative to the Tailscale control server. headscale has a narrower scope and an instance of headscale implements a single Tailnet, which is typically what a single organisation, or home/personal setup would use.
short_desc: An open source, self-hosted implementation of the Tailscale control server
author: juanfont
